![https://www.einsteinfoundation.de/en/award](../include/img/einstein-fdn-2024-winners.png){#fig-einstein-fdn-awards-2024}

The Einstein Foundation Berlin has announced [winners](https://www.einsteinfoundation.de/en/award) of the 2024 awards for promoting quality in research.
Dutch microbiologist Elisabeth Bik is among the winners.
Bik's work has [uncovered multiple errors in research papers](@Shen2020-ry), especially duplicated images.
